input_output module¶

numerical module¶

numerical.calc_auto(wavef)¶

Claculate autocorelation. :param wavef: input array. :type wavef: complex array

Returns

output array.

Return type

autocofu (array)

numerical.check_if_significant_np(data_in, threshold)¶

Check if significant with regard to threshold. :param data_in: input data. :type data_in: float array :param threshold: the threshold value. :type threshold: float

Returns

significant columns. indicies (integer array): indicies of significant values.

Return type

data_out (float array)

numerical.do_DFT(data_in, tmax)¶

Do Discrete Fourier transformation. :param data_in: input data. :type data_in: array :param tmax: sample frequency. :type tmax: float

Returns

output array. data_w (array): the Discrete Fourier Transform sample frequencies.

Return type

data_s (complex array)

numerical.do_positive_DFT(data_in, tmax)¶

Do Discrete Fourier transformation and take POSITIVE frequency component part. :param data_in: input data. :type data_in: array :param tmax: sample frequency. :type tmax: float

Returns

output array with POSITIVE frequency component part. data_w (array): the Discrete Fourier Transform sample frequencies POSITIVE frequency component part.

Return type

data_s (array)
